definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives

sentences.english: The crowd greeted the performers with boos and hiss es.
sentences.chinese: 观众向演出者发出一片嘘声。

sentences.english: The crowd was disappointed about the lack of enthusiam from the players.
sentences.chinese: 一些缺乏激情的选手们令观众大失所望。

sentences.english: Finally, to seek a corresponding point of the audiences from home and abroad under the globalizational context.
sentences.chinese: 在全球化语境下，寻求中外观众审美需求的契合点。

sentences.english: In Taipei's movie district, the action flicks are always the biggest draws.
sentences.chinese: 台北西门町的电影街中，动作片的观众总是最多。

sentences.english: Safety of the spectators will also be guaranteed thanks to a related comprehensive insurance bill.
sentences.chinese: 此外，相关的综合责任保险也将覆盖观众的安全问题。

sentences.english: Part of your audience wants to see the pianist and presenter.
sentences.chinese: 一部分观众想要看到钢琴演奏者和演示者。

sentences.english: You are free to distribute the viewer and to incorporate the library in your product.
sentences.chinese: 你可以自由分发观众，并把你的产品在库。

sentences.english: Choi, hailing from the country that first created this television formula, obviously knows well what audiences expect.
sentences.chinese: 来自此类节目创始国韩国的崔始源深谙观众的期待。

sentences.english: They make the circus lively and cause people to laugh。
sentences.chinese: 他们使马戏充满生气，使观众捧腹大笑。

sentences.english: The audience in the seats craned forward to look at her.
sentences.chinese: 座上的观众伸着脖子看她。

sentences.english: Arrive before the crowds of spectators and determine the best vantage point.
sentences.chinese: 要在不可计数的观众之前到达并决定最好的有利位置。

sentences.english: A spectator is admitted by ticket only.
sentences.chinese: 1每一名观众都必须凭票入场。

sentences.english: The young movie star revelled in the public's admiration.
sentences.chinese: 这位年轻的电影明星沉湎于观众的赞美声中。

sentences.english: The violent scenes filled the audience with revulsion.
sentences.chinese: 这些暴力的场面使观众很反感。

definition: evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
to act (in a play)/to perform/to put on (a performance)/performance/concert/show/CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
